Add shorthand to caption

Source: R/fn_add.R
add_shorthand_to_caption.Rd

add_shorthand_to_caption() is an Add function that updates an object by adding new values to new or empty fields. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to add shorthand to caption. The function returns Caption (a character vector of length one).

Usage

add_shorthand_to_caption(
  caption_1L_chr = "",
  data_tsb = NULL,
  min_1L_int = 3L,
  original_xx = character(0),
  shorten_1L_chr = character(0)
)

Arguments

caption_1L_chr

Caption (a character vector of length one), Default: ”

data_tsb

Data (a tsibble), Default: NULL

min_1L_int

Minimum (an integer vector of length one), Default: 3

original_xx

Original (an output object of multiple potential types), Default: character(0)

shorten_1L_chr

Shorten (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

Value

Caption (a character vector of length one)
